404.title: Oopsies!
404.text: Are you at the right page?

wip.wip-text: This page is still a work in progress...

introduction.title: Final Year Computer Engineering Student at Nanyang Technological University.
introduction.text: I'm passionate about building software that solves real-world problems, and I'm always looking for opportunities to learn and grow.

content-body: Developed and maintained the frontend of the company's web application
Collaborated with the backend team to integrate new features
Optimized the application for performance and user experience
Developed the frontend of the chatbot using React
Implemented the backend using Node.js and ExpressJS
Integrated the chatbot with Huggingface's transformers
Developed the navigation system for an autonomous vehicle
Integrated the navigation system with the vehicle's sensors
Optimized the navigation system for real-time performance
